title: Games held hostage,
body:
Why is it one person can an does ruin a game? Just had a game where a karthus went full ad into nasus an kept giving him kills. And that scewed the game so horribly. What do i do as a support bot? our jungle? who ow is getting chased through his own jungle due to enemy jungle not having to anything so he has more free time to hunt our jungle more chances to  mid or bot,  how is it riot still allows people loss of lp? While this nonsense, no other word for it. Continues to occur. 

Riot should just add a lp buffer.  If someone goes 0/8 within first mins of game it should raise some dam flags. 

ither that ior make it so that gold income from champs drops out faster so u can actualy try to fight through it. Cuz atm it just scews thigns soshly. and just gives out free lp to enemy team if u have a feeder.

replies.body: classic answer: he has the freedom to go full ad tho, also going 0/8  can mean they had a bad game, also dont flame your teammates! (not saying you did, but just dont!)

except during and after they admited to feeding so that we would lose. those the point of this post. that a single person can destroy ur lp. or ruin ur games.
too bad, just had a game,2mins ago from me writing this message, my bot lane went 0/10, what can i do? nothing, also -20 btw.
In Riot's opinion, if you can't regularly carry a feeder, afk, or troll, you don't deserve to rank up.

> [{quoted}](name=Fructivore,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rQJ7hcO4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-26T00:03:38.414+0000)

> In Riot's opinion, if you can't regularly carry a feeder, afk, or troll, you don't deserve to rank up.
if this is true then riot only caters to trolls an does not care how many games are ruined.

you are allowed to _**anything**_ except flaming/toxicity/hate speech/whatever riot considers bad language, as long as you are trying to hardest, I understand how people playing off meta is demotivating, especially in ranked, but riot wants to keep their game as free as possible, even pros do stupid shit during games(with strategy of course) but its best to keep an open mind during games, if ranked is fucking you, go play some ARAM or draft pick.

> Riot should just add a lp buffer. If someone goes 0/8 within first mins of game it should raise some dam flags.

Then someone trolling the game would just wait out that threshold to make sure that doesn't happen.

>ither that ior make it so that gold income from champs drops out faster so u can actualy try to fight through it. 

That changes the game balance. We would likely start seeing tactics where a person who is already behind start mindlessly pushing with the knowledge that even if someone comes to kill them the enemy would gain very little. Making pushing always the best option.

The issue is, no matter what sort of preventive measure you try to make it's going to be something that's easy to bypass by someone who is trying to bypass it. It will succeed mostly in just making things worse for players that legitimately have a poor game or just change the game balance.
